page.title: 07EDUCATION
page.content: CHANCELLORS SCHOOL Chancellors School which is now a mixed comprehensive school for pupils between the age of eleven and nineteen.The school was opened in 1964 in new buildings on land which at one time formed part of Gobians,the country home of Sir Thomas More,Henry the Eigths Lord Chancellor from 1532 to 1535. The Headmaster of the school is currently Mr P.Wormleighton.The school stands in a rural area next to Brookmans Park Golf Club.The subjects currently offered are English Mathematics,Geography,Music,Technical Drawing,Woodwork,Metalwork,Engineering ,Home Economics,Needlework,Art and Pottery,Biology,Chemistry and Physics, Modern Languages,Drama,Computer Studies,Physical Education,Religious
